nodes.text: The Yuna Bore venom mine was a Quesh venom mine operated by the Galactic Republic on the planet Quesh during the Galactic War. The mine was attacked and destroyed by the forces of the reconstituted Sith Empire under Moff Dracen during the Quesh war.
The Yuna Bore venom mine appears on Quesh in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
